page.title: 09Education in Langho
page.content: St. Mary's R.C. school and St. Leonard's C.E. school are both primary schools catering for children from 4 years of age to 11 years . There are 3 infant classes and 4 junior classes in each school . The curriculum covers work in Language , Number , Religous Education, Geography , History , Science , Music , Art and Physical Education . Each school has its own sports teams and school choir . Most children of primary age group attend these schools , though a few go out of the area to private schools . Most children have their lunch at the school they attend . In the evenings the schools are used for adult education classes and meetings of local organisations .
